name: MPGH Clean Edit
description: Removes a bunch of stuff to clean up the head of the pages.
additional_info:
You are allowed to use this in your own styles if you credit me and provide a link to this page.

Feel free to edit the css to remove certain parts. Simple add "/*" to the stat of a line to disable it (only for lines starting with ", "). You can also remove what you don't like.

Currently removes:
- All the top ads
- The first navbar, which nobody uses (why have 2 anyway)
- Removes social media buttons from the top of the page
- Removes "porra" (the ugly af red stickman)
- Remove the third row on the homepage, which contains Facebook, birthdays and hack features
- All the Like/Share Facebook buttons
- Space between the hacks bar ( with the CS:GO Hacks, LoL Hacks, GTAV hacks, ...)
